existing_features.title: Update `frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx` to make the History page easier to navigate and maintain by refactoring the eight narrative sections (I–VIII) into a single structured data array and rendering the cards by mapping over that data, without changing the visible story text.

Add in-page navigation to `frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx` by including a table of contents near the top of the main content that links to each section (I–VIII) using anchored IDs, and ensure the anchor links work on both desktop and mobile.

projectName: Edit and improve the History page
